name: Laurel County Cooperative Extension Family & Consumer Sciences
description: Laurel County Cooperative Extension Office provides educational programs and resources through the University of Kentucky. Family & Consumer Sciences offers nutrition education, life skills training, health and wellness programs, and family development services to improve the quality of life for Laurel County residents.
source: Verified from official University of Kentucky Extension website and Google search results
eligibility_requirements: Open to all Laurel County residents
populations_served: Laurel County residents of all ages
cost_information: Most programs are free or low-cost
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2024-01-15. CITATIONS: Contact information verified from official University of Kentucky Extension website https://laurel.ca.uky.edu/. Phone number (606) 864-4167 confirmed working and listed on official website. Email laurel.ext@uky.edu verified from official website. Address 200 County Extension Rd., London, KY 40741 verified from official website and Google Maps. Hours confirmed as Monday-Friday 8:00 AM-4:30 PM from official website. Website verified current and accessible. This is part of the University of Kentucky Cooperative Extension Service. All information cross-referenced with Google search results for consistency. Programs include nutrition education, life skills, health and wellness, and family development services.
